scripts.gen-furniture: yarn aseprite -b art/furniture/*.aseprite --sheet-pack --format json-array --list-tags --list-slices --filename-format '{title}' --sheet src/game/sprites/data/furniture.png --data src/game/sprites/data/furniture.json
scripts.gen-ksv: for file in $(ls art/cfe-ksv-* | sed 's/art\///' | sed 's/.aseprite//'); do yarn aseprite -b art/$file.aseprite --script art/ksv-sprite-mod.lua --sheet-pack --format json-array --list-tags --filename-format '#{tag} {tagframe}' --sheet src/game/sprites/data/$file.png --data src/game/sprites/data/$file.json; done
scripts.gen-reb: yarn aseprite -b art/cfe-reb.aseprite --script art/ksv-sprite-mod.lua --sheet-pack --format json-array --list-tags --filename-format '#{tag} {tagframe}' --sheet src/game/sprites/data/cfe-reb.png --data src/game/sprites/data/cfe-reb.json
scripts.gen-feenoks-lady: yarn aseprite -b art/feenoks-lady.aseprite --sheet-pack --format json-array --list-tags --filename-format '#{tag} {tagframe}' --sheet src/game/sprites/data/feenoks-lady.png --data src/game/sprites/data/feenoks-lady.json
